group_1.textLeft: Alright, it's about time I go visit Suitoku.

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, you said you were gonna return@that book.

group_1.textLeft: In our case, since we came out all this way,@we'll be sticking around.

group_1.textRight: It's been a while since we got to chat@with anyone from Neo-Magius, hasn't it?

group_1.textCenter: Except there's not much of a point in you going@to Suitoku Temple now, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, there you are, Himena!

group_1.textRight: Kyaha★@Long time no see, Irorin!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's been a while.
But what did you mean, there's no point@in me going?

group_1.textRight: Well, you see, this cutie was over at Suitoku@just now.
The whole clan's heading to the Coordinator's@as we speak.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, so even if I go visit, nobody will be there?

group_1.textRight: Pretty much, yeah.

group_1.textLeft: So what were you doing at Suitoku, then,@Princess?

group_1.textRight: Mm...I guess you could say I was hosting@a Tokime Clan fashion show?

group_1.textLeft: A Tokime Clan...what?

group_1.textRight: Lemme take it from the top...

group_1.narration: "So Shizuka seems like she's super curious@about fashion, but let's be real,@none of her groupies know shit@about dressing up, yeah?"
"So I figured I'd do them a solid@and took them all on a shopping trip,@and had everyone show off our outfits@as soon as they got home…"

group_1.textLeft: You'll be up next, Shizuka.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you better get dressed.

group_1.textLeft: Ugh, I'm so nervous...

group_1.textRight: What's in that bag?

group_1.textLeft: Miss Aika said she prepared an outfit for me.

group_1.textRight: Oh, how kind of her.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm going to motivate myself@and get dressed.

group_1.textRight: Oh, Sunao, look!@Here comes Ryoko!

group_1.textLeft: I'm eager to see her new look.

group_1.textCenter: Now, next up in the Tokime Clan Fashion Show,@here's entry number eight:

group_1.narration: "Argh, it's so itchy...@I never dress up like this,@and it feels so weird..."

group_1.textRight: Sh-sh-sh-sh...[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:102601:lipSynch_1][chara:102601:motion_400]She looks SO pure and@wholesome!

group_1.textLeft: A ruffled, off-the-shoulder dress@in pale white tones...
And her hair is neatly trimmed and layered@together...

group_1.textRight: You're breaking new ground, Ryoko!
I dub this, The Sleeping Beauty Awakens!@Ryoko's Gold Rush!

group_1.narration: "Charu, you little rat,@I'll make you regret this!@I'm trying to be brave here and@you're dunking on me for it!"

group_1.textRight: WHAT?! I'm complimenting you, though!

group_1.narration: "Argh, I can't take this anymore!@I'm outta here!"

group_1.textCenter: Alright, next up, we've got our number one@contender, the head of the Tokime Clan!
Entry number nine is Shizuka Tokime!

group_1.narration: "Now that I've fired up my nerves away...@How's this?@The "theem" of this "quarter-nation"@is the strength of the Tokime Clan!"

group_1.textRight: Shizuka...

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka...!

group_1.narration: "I guess it's too good for words?"

group_1.textRight: No, I mean...! Why are you dressed up@like a motorcycle gangster?!

group_1.textLeft: Is this...some kind of joke...?

group_1.narration: "Erm, ah, what's...?@Why is everyone looking at me like that...?"

group_1.textRight: Those are the kind of clothes@that delinquents wear!

group_1.textCenter: I mean, like, since you wanted a change of pace,@I figured we should make a hard contrast,
like a "sweet and sour" kinda thing,@but maybe I didn't pull it off right?
So yeah, the fashion show got shut down@and they threw me out on my ass.
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Then they all left for the Coordinator's shop,@talking about how to beat me next time.

group_1.textRight: Oh, Shizuka...

group_1.textLeft: Don't you think you're toying with her a bit@too much? It's rather pathetic...

group_1.textRight: No way! I picked out those clothes myself!@It was my number one favorite outfit!

group_1.textLeft: I don't think that's the problem here...

group_1.textRight: C'mon, you guys are making it look like I'm the@bad guy here...
Well, there IS a part of me that likes@to mess with her...

group_1.textLeft: And so she admits it...

group_1.textRight: So what now, Irorin? Wanna hang out with me@for some drinks?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Actually, I need to run over@to the Coordinator's, too.
I just got a text from Kagome asking me@to come.
